Minions Puppy.Plot: Dave seeing many owners walk their dogs wants a puppy of his own. He finds a mini-UFO who becomes his pal. This short film released with Despicable Me 2 chronicles how Dave helps the UFO return home.
Minions Puppy.Title: Minions Puppy

Pretty Woman.Plot: One of Roys most famous songs.
Pretty Woman.Title: Pretty Woman

Minions Banana Song.Plot: Banana is a song sung by The Minions in the teaser trailer of Despicable Me 2. It is a parody of the Beach Boys Barbara Ann. One minion gets annoyed by another, most likely Stuart, who keeps on playing his party horn while they are singing. So, at the end, he punched Stuart.
Minions Banana Song.Title: Minions Banana Song

Minions Banana.Plot: Minions fight over a banana. In the process, they wreak havoc in the Bomb Factory.
Minions Banana.Title: Minions Banana

Squatters Rights.Plot: Chip-n-Dale have set up house in the wood stove of Mickeys cabin. Pluto knows they are there, but Mickey only knows his matches keep going out when he tries to light a fire.
Squatters Rights.Title: Squatters Rights
